description: It's true, lightweight yet high-performing swimwear really does exist. Just give the men's Fenton Boardshort a spin and you'll see why. Recycled poly makes it super stretchy, UPF 50+ keeps you sun safe, and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish makes switching from sea to sand a breeze.
name: Prana Fenton Boardshorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
